title: Fantom Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will FTM Investors Waver in Crypto Winter?
description: Fantom Price Prediction 2023-2032 Fantom (FTM) was created to overcome Ethereum’s limitations and create a new generation of blockchain solving the trilemma of scalability, security, and decentralization. However, with Fantom’s outstanding 2,108% growth and additional 2,000% unique addresses, FTM continues to struggle, losing 93% of its value from its ATH in Jan 2022. A better […]
